title: "Mother elephant seals able to recognize their pup's voice just two days after giving birth"
excerpt: "A team of researchers from the University of California's Institute of Marine Sciences, Institut des Neurosciences Paris-Saclay and the University of Lyon has found that mother elephant seals are able to distinguish their own pups' voices just two days after giving birth."
